pullRequest.title: Update Chest API for new merging logic.
pullRequest.bodyText:
SpongeAPI | SpongeCommon
Chests now have much better logic for finding its connected chest. This PR updates the mixin's logic to match Vanilla's.
Also, LockableLootTileEntity's customName property was moved to its superclass in Vanilla. This PR also updates the mixins to reflect that change.

commit.message: Update Chest API for new merging logic.

Make LockableLootTileEntityMixin_API compile.

The customName was moved to LockableTileEntity in Vanilla.

nodes.bodyText: Please remove the space between shadowed fields

commit.message: Formatting + cast the right variable for accessor
